reviewText: If you are not satisfied with your drum finish, then this DVD is for you. If you want to learn how to build drum shells or make bearing edges then start looking somewhere else. There is no single information on these two topics on DVD except author is mentioning bearing edges in bonus materials but this information you can find for free from other sources on Youtube. Great disappointment. DVD assume that you buy shells and then play with them.
Awesome DVD. You will learn alot!!
